name: Psycho (itch)
description:
"Let's make the first psychogeographic videogame," I told Tim. There have been movies, there have been drawings, there have been texts. But what would it look like as a digital game?

We grabbed the Metropolitan Line in London all the way to the end, wandered, and then tried to express our observations through gameplay.

This game was made in collaboration with Tim Phillips. It was made during the MA Digital Games: Theory and Design at Brunel University.
